doc.previous: When a word space comes in the middle of a syllable that is when a syllable spans words a tie bar can be used for liaison The liaison tie is also used to join lexical words into phonological words for example in the Croatian illustration in the IPA Handbook
doc.after: In the typical theory of syllable structure the general structure of a syllable consists of three segments These segments are grouped into two components
